name: cca-moodle-styles
description: CCA custom Moodle styles (HTML, CSS, JS)

scripts.js: gulp addlhtml; cat build/footer.js | pbcopy; open 'https://moodle.cca.edu/admin/settings.php?section=additionalhtml#admin-additionalhtmlfooter'
scripts.jsd: gulp addlhtml; cat build/footer.js | pbcopy; open 'https://moodle-stg-1.cca.edu/admin/settings.php?section=additionalhtml#admin-additionalhtmlfooter'
scripts.mobile: gulp mobile; kubectl cp build/mobile.css moo-prod/$(kubectl -n 'moo-prod' get pods | ack moodle | cut -d ' ' -f 1):/bitnami/moodle/local

author: phette23 <phette23@gmail.com> (http://phette.net)
